description: Shinjou Ichirou, otherwise known as Ichirou Alex Rodriguez Shinjou is a student at Saint Ishiyama Academy and member of the Rokkisei. He is a second-year at Saint Ishiyama High with light wavy hair. The captain of the boxing club, he is regarded as the second best high school boxer in the nation and is known to finish all matches with a one-hit knockout of the opponent. He also plays the piano.
name: Shinjou Alex Rodriguez Ichirou
